profile.name: Tony Jose Matos
profile.summary: Innovative AI strategist, creative technologist, and design expert passionate about blending technology and art. Skilled in crafting immersive digital experiences, leveraging AI for creative workflows, and building engaging brand narratives.

responsibilities: Developed Beachpunk, an immersive IP blending beach culture with punk aesthetics, growing a dedicated following on X.
Designed and executed branding, visual assets, and marketing strategies for consistency and engagement.
Integrated AI tools to optimize content production, audience interaction, and storytelling innovation.
Provided strategic AI integration solutions for creative workflows in design and content production.
Led branding and UX/UI initiatives for startups and businesses undergoing digital transformation.
Designed compelling visuals, brand identities, and digital experiences for high-engagement communities.
Partnered with industry leaders to develop cutting-edge visual content using AI for creative efficiency.
Spearheaded marketing campaigns aligned with brand vision and audience expectations.
Created and managed multimedia content for social platforms, expanding reach and engagement.
Integrated Runway AI into creative processes, reducing production time by 20% while maintaining quality.
Leveraged Leonardo and Adobe Firefly for content creation, boosting brand awareness by 15%.
Implemented Neural Frames and SDXL for immersive brand experiences, increasing customer retention by 20%.
Developed Montessori education materials with interactive elements, increasing sales by 30%.
Iterated designs based on educator feedback, improving customer satisfaction by 40%.
Led marketing strategies for a product launch, exceeding sales projections by 50%.
Designed innovative Smart Design Home goods, increasing brand awareness by 20%.
Implemented a digital marketing strategy, boosting online engagement by 30% and website traffic by 15%.
Created compelling imagery, growing social media followership by 25%.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Marketing Communications

tools_technologies: Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro)
AI-powered design & automation tools (Midjourney, Flux, Luma’s Dream Machine, Runway, Krea, ElevenLabs, Udio)
Web development & interactive media (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
notable_achievements: Built Beachpunk’s digital presence using AI for storytelling and engagement.
Advised startups and agencies on AI-enhanced creative workflows.
Recognized for innovative design, branding, and AI integration.
Led an award-winning Art Card series campaign in Europe with Maitri Learning.

work_style.description: Accepts accountability, believes in honest intentions, completes tasks diligently, and sees the best in situations.

needs_motivations.description: Supports inventive solutions, combines information creatively, and seeks new knowledge through artistic expression.

problem_solving.description: Takes action with minimal investigation, evaluates issues broadly, and enjoys complex, thought-intensive projects.

leadership_approach.description: Defends positions, acknowledges shortcomings, influences others comfortably, and maintains sincerity.

working_with_others.description: Exhibits agreeability, encourages success, shows compassion, and delivers positive feedback.
